name: MEDTRONIC INC., petitioner, v. BOSTON SCIENTIFIC CORPORATION, et al.
name_abbreviation: Medtronic Inc. v. Bos. Scientific Corp.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
MEDTRONIC INC., petitioner,
v.
BOSTON SCIENTIFIC CORPORATION, et al.
attorneys: Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted. Motion of Tessera Technologies, Inc. for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied.
casebody.head_matter:
MEDTRONIC INC., petitioner,
v.
BOSTON SCIENTIFIC CORPORATION, et al.
No. 12-1128.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 15, 2013.
Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted. Motion of Tessera Technologies, Inc. for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied.
